title: Challenge of the trade
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke, George Cass and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: Lucianne New follows the career of Dale Baker, principal dancer with the Australian Ballet including footage of Dale performing one of the leading roles in the popular musical “Cats”. Dale shares his thoughts on being male in a world of dance.
creator_credit_for_label: Chris O’Rourke, George Cass and Victoria. Ministry of Education
